item.title: 60 years after Gemini, newly processed images reveal incredible details

item.title: The personhood trap: How AI fakes human personality
item.description: AI assistants don’t have fixed personalities—just patterns of output guided by humans.

item.title: Google improves Gemini AI image editing with “nano banana” model
item.description: Gemini 2.5 Flash Image is currently atop LMArena’s image editing leaderboard.
